title: Setting the scene iPod tour: designer interviews
brief_description: A joint production with AFTRS, this is a series of four interviews with Australian production designers for the walking tour part of ACMI’s Setting the Scene exhibition. Roger Ford talks about Mon Oncle and The Terminal, Owen Paterson on Fritz Lang’s Metropolis, Chris Kennedy on Stanley Kubrick’s The Shining and Stephen Curtis on Peter Greenaway’s The Cook, the thief, his wife and her lover.
